## Types and classes
### Types
```{r}
typeof(1.5)
typeof("toto")
typeof('also between single quotes')
typeof(TRUE)
typeof(1L)
typeof(1)
typeof(typeof)
typeof(list())
```

### Classes

```{r}
data(iris)
typeof(iris)
class(iris)
```
